member.name: T:JulMar.Collections.ObservableDictionary`2
member.summary: This is a Dictionary that supports INotifyCollectionChanged semantics.
member.remarks: WARNING: this dictionary is NOT thread-safe! You must still provide synchronization to ensure no writes are done while the dictionary is being enumerated! This should not be a problem for most bindings as they rely on the CollectionChanged information.

member.name: T:JulMar.Collections.WeakReferenceList`1
member.summary: A List(Of T) that implements weak reference semantics. Elements in the list can be collected if no other reference exists to the object. The list automatically cleans up when any item is added or removed.
member.remarks: Do not use this for List(String) - strings are interned and treated differently by the CLR. As such they will never be "dead" and so this class will act just like a normal List - so just use List.

member.typeparam: The type of object to monitor for property changes.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of PropertyObserver, which observes the 'propertySource' object for property changes.

member.summary: Registers a callback to be invoked when the PropertyChanged event has been raised for the specified property.
member.param: The callback to invoke when the property has changed.
member.returns: The object on which this method was invoked, to allow for multiple invocations chained together.

member.summary: Removes the callback associated with the specified property.

Set the owner of the window
member.returns: True/False if UI is displayed

Object state to associate with the dialog
Set the owner of the window

member.summary: This can be used to indicate that all property values have changed.

member.name: M:JulMar.Mvvm.ViewModel.RaisePropertyChanged``1(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{``0}})
member.summary: This raises the INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged event to indicate a specific property has changed value. This version provides a compile-time safe way to indicate the property through the use of an expression tree / lambda. Be aware that for high-volume changes this version might be much slower than the above "magic-string" version due to the creation of an expression and runtime lookup.
member.typeparam: Type where it is being raised

member.name: M:JulMar.Mvvm.ViewModel.RaisePropertyChanged(System.String)
member.summary: This raises the INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged event to indicate a specific property has changed value.

member.name: T:JulMar.Services.MessageMediator
member.summary: This class creates a simple Mediator which loosely connects different objects together. The message handlers are organized using string-based message keys and are held in a WeakReference collection.

member.name: M:JulMar.Services.MessageMediator.Subscribe(System.String,System.Action)
member.summary: Registers a specific method with no parameters as a handler

member.name: M:JulMar.Services.MessageMediator.Subscribe``1(System.String,System.Action{``0})
member.summary: This registers a specific method as a message handler for a specific type.

member.name: M:JulMar.Services.MessageMediator.Subscribe``1(System.Action{``0})
member.summary: This registers a specific method as a message handler for a specific type.

member.name: M:JulMar.Services.MessageMediator.InternalRegisterHandler(System.Object,System.Delegate)
member.summary: Performs the actual registration of a target

member.name: M:JulMar.Services.MessageMediator.InternalUnregisterHandler(System.Object,JulMar.Services.MessageMediator.WeakAction)
member.summary: Performs the unregistration from a target

member.name: M:JulMar.Services.MessageMediator.SendMessage(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: This method broadcasts a message to all message targets for a given message key and passes a parameter.
member.returns: True/False if any handlers were invoked.

member.name: M:JulMar.Services.MessageMediator.SendSimpleMessage(System.String)
member.summary: This method broadcasts a message with no parameters
member.returns: True/False if any handlers were invoked.

member.name: M:JulMar.Services.MessageMediator.SendMessage``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: This method broadcasts a message to all message targets for a given message key and passes a parameter.
member.returns: True/False if any handlers were invoked.

member.name: M:JulMar.Services.MessageMediator.SendMessage``1(``0)
member.summary: This method broadcasts a message to all message targets for a given parameter type. If a derived type is passed, any handlers for interfaces or base types will also be invoked.
member.returns: True/False if any handlers were invoked.

member.summary: This method broadcasts a message to all message targets for a given message key and passes a parameter. The message targets are all called asynchronously and any resulting exceptions are ignored.
